root: ^Hey, keep it down, I don't want G to know I'm here. Sorry, that's no way to greet a fellow student. I'm Helena, I didn't get to meet you when you arrived. How you liking it so far here at Flatrock?
^I think I'm gonna like it here.

like: ^That's what I like to hear. Just don't get on Guillermo's bad side and you'll get on great here. Don't get on anyones bad side actually, there's not enough people here for that.
dislike: ^Home? This is your home now silly. I guess I shouldn't be so harsh, it can be hard to adjust I get it. But for me, this is the only place that's felt like home. I hope it does to you too.
